resources:
if you need create dimen for width or height of view, dimen must have title view_param + value example button has height 80dp - view_param_80 if you need create dimen for margin or padding of view, dimen must have title indentation + value example button has margin 16dp - indentation_16 if you need create dimen for text size of view, dimen must have title text_size + value example button has text size 16sp - text_size_16
16dp
